# Contribution guidelines

We can add a contributing guidelines file by adding a .md file.

Examples:

1.  https://github.com/Call-for-Code-for-Racial-Justice/Legit-Info/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md
2.  https://github.com/openeew/openeew/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md
3.  https://github.com/atom/atom/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md
4.  https://github.com/rails/rails/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md
